body.p:
472
Jany. 20". 4.
Col. S. D. Bruce
20" Ky. Infy Vols.
Louisville
Sir,

Yours of the 19" instant received. Capt. Walcott. did not represent, that the Certificate given by you was designed to recommend him for promotion, nor did he communicate in any way with this Department, asking for the promotion. He was commissioned by the Governor upon the recommendation of Major Waller, and your Certificate of his qualifications as an officer.

Respectfully
Your obdt Servt --
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
